Contributor: Great Britain. National War Savings Committee.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to "buy National War Bonds regulary week by week." Illustration shows a women in a helmet and colorful robes, a symbolic figure of Liberty.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
